column6: Guest-starring Ronin, Mockingbird, Tigra and Wonder Man! When one of your old teammates turns into a one man army determined to take out a major target on US soil, what's a former West Coast Avenger to do?  Howzabout stage the most insanely explosive intervention in Marvel history?  Don't miss the mayhem as Jim Rhodes' best friends from the past form a new crew to prevent War Machine from turning traitor in the book CBR.com calls "a visual spectacle...it's high octane, higher-caliber adventure"!    Rated T  ...$2.99
